Lavender Grapefruit G&T Recipe | Bon Appétit

With the combination of bright, citrusy grapefruit and lavender, this G&T becomes the perfect rooftop cocktail. Simple. Refreshing. Delicious.By BOMBAY SAPPHIRE® GINJuly 21, 20215.0(1)Read ReviewsTriangleEmailPinterestPrintTed + Chelsea CavanaughEmailPinterestPrintEmailPinterestPrintIngredients1½oz. Bombay Sapphire3oz. premium tonic water2lavender sprigs, for garnish2Tbsp. lavender buds½oz. lavender syrup½oz. cup water½oz. cup sugar¼red grapefruit, plus ½ wheel for servingPreparationStep 1In a small pot, combine the sugar and ½ cup water. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring until the sugar is dissolved. Step 2Remove from the heat and transfer into a heatproof container. Add the lavender buds. Let cool to room temperature then transfer to the refrigerator. Strain the simple syrup into another container; discard solids. Step 3Add lavender syrup to the balloon glass and ¼ of a grapefruit with the peel on. Muddle gently to release juice. Next, add the Bombay Sapphire Gin.Step 4Fill the glass with ice and pour in the tonic. Garnish with a grapefruit and lavender blossoms. Lastly, smile and look at what you have made and enjoy!Click to Shop Bombay Sapphire NowBE BRILLIANT AND INSPIRED. DRINK RESPONSIBLY!©2021.
